Name: Darryl Fearon
Description:
Darryl was not trans himself, but was had come to the aid of three trans people who were being harassed by Christian Soto-Ruiz, 19, in the early morning of 16th July on W. 10th St.

Soto-Ruiz stabbed him to death with a kitchen knife, and slashed one of the trans people.

http://thevillager.com/villager_76/murdervictimsneighbors.html

http://students673.ucr.edu/docsserver/lgbt/trans_remembrance_display_posters.pdf

Name: Ricky Lee Blakes
Description:
Ricky was reportedly a cross dresser. He was shot multiple times, allegedly by Anthony Rogers, who picked up Ricky, believing they were a woman, then violently killed them when they tried to be intimate with Rogers.

> NORWALK -- Double murder suspect Anthony Rogers may have shot 23-year-old Ricky Lee Blakes Jr. because the college student cross-dressed and offered him sex, a recently unsealed court affidavit indicates.
>
> An informant told police that "Rogers has a strong hatred for gay people," and Rogers' friend and confidant Joshua Huckabee told police that he'd claimed killing Blakes after the young man, dressed in a mini skirt, halter top and wig, tried to give him oral sex, according to the Feb. 6 affidavit, filed at Stamford Superior Court.
>
> Rogers, formerly of 18 Quintard Ave., was driving in South Norwalk when he stopped and picked up Blakes, Huckabee told police. Rogers banged Blakes' head against the steering wheel, threw him out of the car and shot him in the back after the student made sexual advances, according to Huckabee's written statement.

https://www.thehour.com/norwalk/article/Homophobia-possible-motive-in-alleged-murder-8289462.php

https://www.thehour.com/norwalk/article/Murder-trial-against-convicted-killer-of-Norwalk-8270398.php
